name: @monorka/structicon
description: Deterministic identicon system inspired by molecular structures.

scripts.build: tsup src/index.ts src/cli.ts src/react.tsx --format cjs,esm,iife --global-name Structicon --dts --clean
scripts.dev: tsup src/index.ts src/cli.ts src/react.tsx --format cjs,esm,iife --global-name Structicon --watch --dts

author: monorka
